description:
When people need legal assistance with a complex family matter, they turn to The Mandel Law Firm. From our office in New York, New York, we are there to counsel clients and, if necessary, represent them in trial. We handle issues including divorce, child support, custody and visitation, maintenance and domestic violence. Additionally, our attorneys provide niche family law services for the LGBTQ community. We are also able to help with complicated cases involving immigration statuses.

The founder of our law firm, Steven Mandel, has more than 35 years of experience and practice in New York. Over his career, he has earned several distinctions and awards. This includes an AV Preeminent* peer-review rating, the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell. Mr. Mandel has been selected for inclusion in New York Super Lawyers annually since 2014 and as a Top 100 Lawyer in the United States.

His peers have also chosen him to serve as co-chair of the New York County Lawyers Association's Matrimonial Section. In addition, NY Magazine has designated Mr. Mandel as Family Law Practitioner of the Year. All major New York newspapers have quoted our founder and relied extensively on his deep legal knowledge.

No matter what type of case he is handling, Mr. Mandel assesses each client's unique situation and crafts a custom strategy for resolution. The Mandel Law Firm works with people across the greater New York metropolitan area. We offer a free initial consultation and accept credit cards as payment.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
